Articles.Content:
I don't know why, but for any reason I can't create a route.
When I click on rocket path, nothing happens.
I already played it earler, I remember it was so easy.

Something is different on last versions? I've some years without play kerbal.
Are you in career mode? Because in career mode, you need a mission control and tracking station upgrade to plot maneuvers.

On 3/27/2022 at 8:50 PM, Kerb24 said:

Are you in career mode? Because in career mode, you need a mission control and tracking station upgrade to plot maneuvers.

Yes, I'm.
Hmmm I got.
Thanks for the answer.
Ivcastro, please do everyone a favour and click on the icon beside Kerb24's name to mark this as SOLVED.
